message: I'm excited to offer you the product at a price that I think is fair. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $1050000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. How about we meet at $950000?
I'm still a bit above my minimum, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $980000, which is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $960000?

I've made a few concessions already, and I'm getting close to my minimum price. I can offer you a deal at $980000, but I'm not going any lower. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a fair deal.
